description:
Drop in replacement of the `Radio`, `Switch` and `Checkbox` component.
Use this component if you want to display an extra label.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propControl: A control element. For instance, it can be a `Radio`, a `Switch` or a `Checkbox`.
propInputRef: Pass a ref to the `input` element.
propLabel: The text to be used in an enclosing label element.
propOnChange: Callback fired when the state is changed.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesLabelPlacementStart: Styles applied to the root element if `labelPlacement="start"`.
stylesLabelPlacementTop: Styles applied to the root element if `labelPlacement="top"`.
stylesLabelPlacementBottom: Styles applied to the root element if `labelPlacement="bottom"`.
stylesDisabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
stylesLabel: Styles applied to the label's Typography component.
